forum_posts.name: thread_id
forum_posts.description: slug_id, for initial_post which started the thread related to this row

forum_posts.name: parent_id
forum_posts.description: slug_id, for response_post to which this comment is attached, if this row has slug_type = comment

forum_posts.name: original_poster
forum_posts.description: username of forum author who created the original thread

forum_posts.name: responded_to
forum_posts.description: username of forum author who created a response to the original thread, if this row has slug_type = 'comment'

forum_posts.name: first_time
forum_posts.description: Time when forum thread/response/comment was created

forum_posts.name: body_preview
forum_posts.description: Preview of first 100 characters of the content of the forum thread/response/comment

description: Table generated with SQL query file forum_posts.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the posts made by learners in course forums.
